title: Massive Loading Screen Error
body: So one of the loading tips is massively incorret. It states that the 'Maximum amount of cdr the can be obtained is 40%'. This is incorrect as of the Intelligence allows 45% cdr to be obtained. I should probs get a skin for this.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Nice find! However this board is more suited for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game and not to report errors/bugs within the game.

Your thread would be better suited for the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board over on NA.
